pylapp.tapster.client.android.assistants.snips

Class SnipsAssistantSkeleton

  • pylapp.tapster.client.android.assistants.snips.SnipsAssistantSkeleton
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AssistantStub

    public class SnipsAssistantSkeleton
implements AssistantStub

    Skeleton based on design pattern Bridge which provides the definitions of methods to call so as to deal with assistants. Will use the API of Snips.ai.

    More details at https://snips.ai/

    Warning: Wa have to refactor this class to optimize it, Snips initialization is heavy, and we may face to memory leaks problems!
